description: From Old French discussion, from Late Latin discussiō, from Latin discutiō.

entries.meaning: Conversation or debate concerning a particular topic.
examples: There was then a long discussion of whether to capitalize words like "east".
This topic is not open to discussion.
My discussion with the professor was very enlightening.

entries.meaning: Text giving further detail on a subject.
examples: Under each heading, you will find a discussion.

entries.meaning: (medicine, obsolete) The dispersion of a tumour.
